_meanings:
{@--5@} One of the six Guṇas
or modes of foreign policy. 
(According to some authorities it means 

‘double-dealing’ or ‘duplicity’,
‘keeping apparently friendly 
relations with the enemy’;  
{#balinordvizatormaDye vAcAtmAnaM samarpayan . dvEDIBAvena#}
{#tizWettu kAkAkzivadalakzitaH ..#}. According
to others it means ‘dividing one's
army and encountering a superior
enemy in detachments’, ‘harassing
the enemy by attacking them in
small bands’; {#dvEDIBAvaH svabalasya#} 
{#dviDAkaraRaM#} <ls>Mit.</ls> on <ls>Y. 1. 347</ls>; <ab>cf.</ab> also
<ls>Ms. 7. 173</ls> and <ls n="Ms. 7.">160</ls>).
